attributes.action: Control by a payable deposit for recycling of plastic one use bottles
attributes.additional_details: Increases recycling, positive effects on climate, reduces pollution
attributes.background: Bring in controls for the recycling of single use plastic bottles where the supplier is taxed on each bottle, the consumer pays a deposit on the bottle, returns it to auto machine that reads barcode and deposit paid back to customer. Machines funded by tax on suppliers or supermarkets.
